items.content_html: Block.js is an open-source, lightweight, simple-to-use JavaScript front-end framework. It makes it extremely simple to have multiple similar elements, without extremely repetitive code.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly "homematicIP CCU" IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) or on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, IntelNUC, etc.)

items.content_html: Spark.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that adopts Dart writing style. no need to package, no need to think about className, no need to write HTML, you only need to focus on writing js scripts to create pages, and built-in data binding , event monitoring, routing management, network request and other functions.只需要专注于编写 js 脚本创建页面即可.
items.title: nullno/spark: Spark.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that adopts Dart writing style. no need to package, no need to think about className, no need to write HTML, you only need to focus on writing js scripts to create pages, and built-in data binding , event monitoring, routing management, network request and other functions.只需要专注于编写 js 脚本创建页面即可.
